entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
